testcase.name: TC01_Validation of Booking Order No in Adaction Web Application
testcase.system-out: Given User launch Adactin Web Page..........................................passed Then User verify Login Page is displayed....................................passed When User enters valid UserName and PassWord................................passed And User clicks Login Button................................................passed Then User verify Search Hotel Page id displayed.............................passed When User selects valid Location , Hotel and Room Type......................passed And User clicks Search Button...............................................passed Then User verify Select Hotel Page is displayed.............................passed When User clicks Radio button and clicks Continue button....................passed Then User verify Book a Hotel page is displayed.............................passed When User enters valid FirstName ,LastName ,Billing Address and Card Number.passed When User selects valid Card Type ,Expiry Month ,Expiry Year and enters CVV.passed And User clicks Book Now button.............................................passed Then User verify Booking order number is displayed..........................passed
